Introduction

Mashiho is a Japanese singer and former member of the boy group TREASURE. He made his solo debut on June 26, 2024, with the digital single "Just the 2 of Us".

In 2018, he participated in YG Entertainment's survival show YG Treasure Box, initially not being selected for the main group, he was later included in a second group called MAGNUM, which was meant to debut alongside TREASURE 13 before being delayed due to scandals surrounding the agency.

On January 6, 2020, YG Entertainment re-organized the groups into a 12-member TREASURE. Mashiho officially debuted with TREASURE on August 7, 2020. He left the group and terminated his contract on November 8, 2022.
